alert.note: Alert for Frontier; Hayes (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 7:33PM CDT until June 07 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Frontier County in southwestern Nebraska... Hayes County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 733 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles west of Hayes Center, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hayes Center, Hamlet, Quick, Bluegill Haven Campground, Willow View Campground, Hayes Center State Wildlife Management Area and Red Willow Reservoir State Recreation Area. This includes Highway 83 between mile markers 27 and 43. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
